queryString: select * from connectionInfo where connectionTime > ? and connectionTime < ?
update connectionInfo set userId = ? where param = ?
delete from connectionInfo where param like ?
select id,level,parent,sequence,name,displayname,icon,redirectpath,description,enabled,type, '' as active from TB_MENU where level = 0 and enabled = 'Y' order by sequence;
select id,level,parent,sequence,name,displayname,icon,redirectpath,description,enabled,type, '' as active from TB_MENU where level = -1 and enabled = 'Y' order by sequence;
